scripts.build-dictionary:taurus: cd dictionary/autonomys-taurus && yarn && yarn codegen && yarn build && cd -

scripts.docker:dev:up: docker compose -p dev-astral-indexers -f ../docker-compose.yml --profile dictionary --profile task --profile taurus up --remove-orphans

scripts.dev: export $(grep -v '^#' ../.env | xargs) && export $(grep -v '^#' ../.env.dev | xargs) && yarn build-dictionary && lerna run codegen && lerna run build && yarn docker:dev:up
